thread.title: Olly Murs pulls out of Brit Awards launch over 'last minute snub'
thread.title_full: Olly Murs pulls out of Brit Awards launch over 'last minute snub'

author: Mirror .co.uk
title: Olly Murs pulls out of Brit Awards launch over 'last minute snub'
text:
Olly Murs pulls out of Brit Awards launch over 'last minute snub' The Troublemaker singer is said to be "gutted" after failing to bag any nominations this year Share Snubbed: Olly Murs (Photo: WireImage)   Thank you for subscribing!   
It looks like this weekend's Brit Awards launch will be missing a pop star in the shape of Olly Murs. 
The singer, 32, was due to perform, but following a last minute snub has reportedly pulled out. 
Disappointed Olly hasn't been nominated in any category this year. 
A source told The Sun : “Olly is gutted. One of his main ambitions is to win a Brit and he really thought he had done enough to be nominated. The star has reportedly lost out (Photo: WENN.com) 
“As soon as Olly and his team found out he had no nominations they made the decision to pull out.” 
Despite a successful year, a music inisder added to the newspaper: "Changes in the Brits voting academy this year means the panel is much younger than normal. That has counted against him.” 
The You Don't Know Love star recently said he had always dreamt of picking up a gong at the ceremony. I'll keep working hard and one day hopefully I will win one," he previously shared (Photo: Rex) 
He shared: "I'd love to win a BRIT Award. That would be an amazing achievement and it's what I work towards every year. I'll keep working hard and one day hopefully I will win one." 
This year's show takes place on 22nd February and the nomations will be revealed this Saturday. 
Mirror Celebs has contacted a spokesperson for Olly for comment. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
